title: Metadata sweep + push coordination notes
summary: Metadata backfill tooling worked smoothly; push coordination still blocked by cross-seat changes
signals: Fractal conformance now clean; manager-report and bus_status show multiple active seats with uncommitted work
actions: Align on shared staging protocol or per-agent push windows; consider automation that snapshots dirty worktree state during session_boot and routes status to managers
notes: Attaching strict receipts required re-running planner validate with --output because _report/ is ignored; codex-2 owns dirty handoff automation so docs temporarily reference manual step.
